headline.main: Cycling-Britain Set World Record in Men's Team Pursuit
headline.print_headline: Cycling-Britain Set World Record in Men's Team Pursuit

docs.snippet: Britain set a new track cycling world record in men's team pursuit as they romped into the Olympic final on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain set a new track cycling world record in men's team pursuit as they romped into the Olympic final on Friday.

headline.main: New Suspect in French Priest Killing Formally Charged
headline.print_headline: New Suspect in French Priest Killing Formally Charged

docs.snippet: A man under arrest since Monday as part of the investigation into the killing of a French priest last month has been placed under formal investigation, a police source told Reuters on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man under arrest since Monday as part of the investigation into the killing of a French priest last month has been placed under formal investigation, a police source told Reuters on Friday.

headline.main: Stormy Finale: A-Rod Doubles, Plays 3rd, Exits With Win
headline.print_headline: Stormy Finale: A-Rod Doubles, Plays 3rd, Exits With Win

docs.snippet: Alex Rodriguez returned to the infield, hugged a reception line of teammates and was handed the final ball from his final game with the New York Yankees. He walked to the area behind third base, leaned down and grabbed a handful of dirt....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez returned to the infield, hugged a reception line of teammates and was handed the final ball from his final game with the New York Yankees. He walked to the area behind third base, leaned down and grabbed a handful of dirt.

headline.main: Another Zika Case Reported Outside Miami's Transmission Zone
headline.print_headline: Another Zika Case Reported Outside Miami's Transmission Zone

docs.snippet: Three more people in Florida have tested positive for Zika caused by local mosquitoes, including another person who does not live in the one-square-mile (2.6-square-km) area believed to be the hub of local transmission, state officials said on Fri...
docs.lead_paragraph: Three more people in Florida have tested positive for Zika caused by local mosquitoes, including another person who does not live in the one-square-mile (2.6-square-km) area believed to be the hub of local transmission, state officials said on Friday.

headline.main: Streaks of DiMaggio: Minor Leaguer Mejia Hits in 49 Straight
headline.print_headline: Streaks of DiMaggio: Minor Leaguer Mejia Hits in 49 Straight

docs.snippet: Francisco Mejia stepped out of the clubhouse and into the dugout with little fanfare. He did his usual turns in the batting cage, and the 5-foot-10, 175-pound catcher looked like just another 20-year-old in the minors....
